dialogue.speaker: Barack Obama
dialogue.text: Gardening is a great way to connect with nature and grow your own food.

dialogue.speaker: Elon Musk
dialogue.text: Why grow food when you can just build a rocket that harvests space vegetables?

dialogue.speaker: Barack Obama
dialogue.text: Well, starting with soil and seeds helps you learn patience and responsibility.

dialogue.speaker: Elon Musk
dialogue.text: Patience is overrated. I'd rather wait for a Mars colony to deliver my salad.

dialogue.speaker: Barack Obama
dialogue.text: But gardening also improves your mental health and brightens your home.

dialogue.speaker: Elon Musk
dialogue.text: Mental health? I get that from launching rockets and tweeting memes.

dialogue.speaker: Barack Obama
dialogue.text: Maybe, but no tweet can replace the satisfaction of watching a tomato grow.

dialogue.speaker: Elon Musk
dialogue.text: Guess I'll rocket-launch a tomato next time. That’s real growth, right?
